name: VINUM ET SPIRITUS ASSOCIATION BELGIUM
goal: defend the economic viability of the belgian alcohol beverages industry ; to engage in the development and communication regarding the industries duty of care ; to develop generic promotion for mainly traditional local alcoholic beverages
interests: Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Regulation 1169 on the implementation of ingrediënt listing and nutritional information ; Regulation 110/2008 ; Directive 92/83/EEC ; Illicit trade of alcohol ; Distance selling to private individuals ; all Regulations on wine; Regulation 251/2014 aromatized wines,
